sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import{Card,CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating.jsx' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {_id,title, city, price,photo,reviews,featured} = tour const { totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) return (
{featured &&Featured}
{city} {avgRating ===0 ? null :avgRating} {totalRating===0 ? ('Not Rated'):(({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per/person
) } export default TourCard
